title: The Silent Coup
story_summary: Martial law grips Stenograd as the Directorate seizes control. Streets grow tense as citizens fight back, cutting off BCI data and breaking cameras. Neighborhoods unite with old tools and secret meetings. City order unravels. A new choice emerges: live under strict rule or tear down the system for good.

official.headline: Order Restored
official.anchor_line: The Directorate announces temporary martial order and curfews to ensure city stability.
official.contextual_reframing: Centralized leadership reinforces citywide safety and seamless access to essential services.

official.headline: Efficiency Upheld
official.anchor_line: Residents reminded to remain compliant as BCI monitoring maintains fair access for all.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic safeguards adjust dynamically, preserving security during uncertain times.

official.headline: A New Crossroads
official.anchor_line: Citizens adapt to new realities as digital networks are challenged by analog cooperation.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd's future will be shaped by the balance between technological order and community initiative.

underground.headline: Martial Law Hits Home
underground.anchor_line: The Directorate's crackdown lands  -  curfews and checkpoints everywhere, dissent erased with a script.
underground.contextual_reframing: Real power just shut the lights off behind closed doors. Citizens whisper: Council's gone, but nobody voted for this.

underground.headline: Surveillance Sabotaged
underground.anchor_line: Residents jam sensors, wreck cameras, ditch their data  -  and the BCI can't keep up any more.
underground.contextual_reframing: People help each other off the grid. Service lines break, digital locks stall, but analog networks buzz back to life.

underground.headline: Stand-Off in the City
underground.anchor_line: With the system crumbling, Stenograd freezes  -  control or freedom, wires or voices. Everyone is watching.
underground.contextual_reframing: This is the choice: surrender to the machine, or reclaim the city with your own hands. Tech has no answer this time.
